publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1064 Willie Coffey: Congratulations to Gibb of Galston—That the Parliament congratulates Gibb of Galston for its achievement in winning the Best Diversification category in Scotland’s Best Rural Retailer Awards 2007, organised by the Scottish Countryside Alliance; applauds the company’s commitment to sustainability; acknowledges the company’s importance locally and to the wider Ayrshire community, creating employment, contributing to the local economy, enhancing the vibrancy of the village of Galston and working with local schools and young people to educate them about the importance of reducing waste, and wishes Jimmy and Janice Gibb and all involved with Gibb of Galston the best of luck in the UK finals of the Best Rural Retailer competition, the winners of which will be announced early in 2008.

S3M-1064 Congratulations to Gibb of Galston (lodged on 19 December 2007) Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Gil Paterson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Dave Thompson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Rob Gibson*, Brian Adam*, Angela Constance*, John Scott*, Alex Neil*
